ur_rna.RNAstructureUI.ui

Class ScrollerPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JScrollPane
            • ur_rna.RNAstructureUI.ui.ScrollerPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.ScrollPaneConstants

    public class ScrollerPane
extends javax.swing.JScrollPane
    A class that creates a scroll pane that can be controlled via the keyboard.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
